text: ve log kadaapi ye na samajhen, jo usamen krpan (kanjasee) karate hain, jo allaah ne unhon apanee daya se pradaan kiya[1] hai ki vah unake lie achchha hai, balki vah unake lie bura hai, jisamen unhonne krpan kiya hai. pralay ke din use unake gale ka haar[2] bana diya jaayega aur aakaashon tatha dharatee kee meeraas (uttaraadhikaar) allaah ke[3] lie hai tatha allaah jo kuchh tum karate ho, usase soochit hai
